title: Computer Science BS
desc: Relevant Coursework: Data Structures and Algorithms, Data Mining, Data Science, Software Engineering Prinicpals, System Design, Cybersecurity Fundementals

title: Server/Host
desc: Server for local Italian restaurant during High School. This role taught me a lot about professional customer service in an upscale setting

title: Overnight Remodel Associate
desc: Summer job in which I assisted with the construction of a store-wide renovation. I received praise from managers in this role due to my strong communication skills and great work ethic

title: Team Member
desc: Another summer job as a worker at a pizza restaurant. I demonstrated fast adaptation to the workplace and provided excellent customer service due to previous years of experience in the industry

title: Public Relations Chair
desc: In charge of managing organization's Instagram page and creating weekly promotional material with Canva. Our Instagram is our primary source of communication, so I was in charge of contacting other organizations

title: President
desc: Led team of seven executive officers and oversaw a student organization with 50+ active members. Facilitated organization growth through a permament 100% growth in semesterly-budget and a 45% general meeting attendance increase

title: Event Coordinator
desc: Leader of the planning and execution of new organization cultural event with a budget of around $4,000. I work closely with other student and university organizations to make our event a possibility

title: Vice Chair
desc: APASC is a student government chartered organization that oversees seven student organizations and six Greek organizations. As Vice Chair, I am tasked with assisting our internal organizations with their needs

title: AgAID AgAthon Participant
desc: University sponsored 48-hour Hackathon. Developed a convolutional neural network using Keras to detect crop residue in images.
